title: Guzzlord

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Dragon Rush: Deal a Basic attack to a player and roleblock them.
- Giga Impact: Deal a Powerful rampaging attack to a player. You may not use abilities the night after using this.
- Belch (**Locked**): Deal a Powerful attack to a player and Unstoppably poison them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - **Unlock Condition**: If you survive an attack, Unlock.

fields.name: Pokemon Ability:
fields.value: - Beast Boost: Whenever you kill a player, your defense permanently increases by a stage. If it's Overprotective or higher, instead all of your attack values permanently increase by a stage.

desc:
Post 2498
*It has gobbled mountains and swallowed whole buildings, according to reports. It's one of the Ultra Beasts.*
